select pd.* from( SELECT pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,pd.pdUseNy ,pd.pdDelNy ,pd.pdDate ,pd.pdFixDate ,pd.pdDesc ,pd.pdType ,pd.pdMeat
ORDER BY pd.pdSeq DESC ) pd limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,pd.pdUseNy ,pd.pdDelNy ,pd.pdDesc ,pd.pdDate ,pd.pdFixDate ,pd.pdType ,pd.pdMeat
FROM product pd WHERE 1=1 AND pd.pdSeq = #{pdSeq}

SELECT rv.rvSeq ,rv.rvRank ,rv.rvComment ,rv.rvDate ,rv.rvFixDate ,rv.product_pdSeq ,rv.member_mmSeq ,mm.mmSeq ,mm.mmNickName ,mm.mmRealName FROM review rv LEFT JOIN member mm ON rv.member_mmSeq = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN product pd ON rv.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq
